name: Resource
description: A resource, for example a projector.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the resource in human-readable form.

attributes.name: owner
attributes.description: The group that is the owner of this resource.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The identifier of the owner Group.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the corresponding 'Group' resource.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name or the group, primarily used for display purposes.  READ-ONLY.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the type of resource, e.g., 'SchoolUnit' or 'Group'.
